CustomBehavior.Text:
TurnIn functionality for Light's Heart has not been implemented into this profile yet.

If you wish to help out, please dump the unit information of the Light's Heart object

You can do this by opening Developer Tools, click Objects at the top, then look under the UNITS section.

Right click the Light's Heart unit and click 'Copy Info'.
You will see the information output into Honorbuddy's log. Copy this and post it to the questing thread along with what class you are.
